job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Role can be performed remotely , candidate needs to work US EST hours.Working with state of the art technologies as part of AI/ ML platform's team enabling scientists in Drug discovery R&D, Safety, Supply chain, Digital Health.Key requirements:â¢BS/MS in Computer Science or Computer Engineeringâ¢6+ years of experience designing & writing production-quality codeâ¢Good Knowledge of NVIDIA SDKs and HPC parallel systemsâ¢Excellent C/C++, CUDA and Python programming and software design skills, including debugging, performance analysis, and testâ¢Knowledge of AWS/ Azure/ GCP cloud ecosystems to work closely on integration efforts with DevOps engineersâ¢Exceptional attention to detail, close engagement in product design, and a constant focus on user experienceâ¢Strong interpersonal skills are required along with the ability to work in a agile & dynamic product-oriented teams on challenging projectsâ¢Good verbal and written communication skills in EnglishWays To Stand Out From The Crowd:â¢Experience working with NVIDIA/ Xilinx or custom ASIC SDKs2+ yrs of experience optimising AI/ ML applications
